name: The Mark of Oxin 2: Emily's Journey
name_original: The Mark of Oxin 2: Emily's Journey
description:
"Let us enter the new world, my son..."

With Alex lost to his father's evil, it's up to Emily to save him and the world! 

Directly following after the events in The Mark of Oxin, The Mark of Oxin 2 takes Emily and her allies through perilous challenges in an effort to acquire all the sacred soul stones and save Alex from the clutches of Hell. Fight monsters, solve puzzles, and traverse the world in an attempt to save it from the forces of evil.

Featuring:

  • New and old characters!
  • Hand drawn art as well as RPGVXAce graphics!
  • RPG cliches! RPG drama! 
  • References to Dan and Phil videos!
  • Dogs! Cats! Animals in general!
  • Convenient teleportation!
  • A plot vaguely lifted from Sacred Stones! (JK, JK. It is kinda similar on accident though.)

PG-13 for swearing, alcohol, references to sexual acts, typical dan and phil business. Not meant to be genuinely good, but maybe an ironic good? About 2 - 4 hours, estimated playtime.

Original Mark of Oxin videos: Part 1, Part 2
